GSA Control Number 25072 (Bul. # 571, Region 2, Page 1)
Item 1
X-Ray Apparatus : Fluoroscopic, stationary type, vertical, 10 MA at 85 KVP, AC. AC $ 1,109.00 each
Note: Two each of the units are Picker X-Ray Corp., Style T-10, 50-60 cycle, 115 volt, 7 amp. Serial Nos. 265 and 506. Two each are G.E. Model PIE 5M, 60 cycle, 115 volt, 10 amp. 1 pole, single throw, Ser. Nos. 521774 and 523174
